posts.title: 大数据
posts.text: 大数据1. Java安装，安装参考2. Spark安装，安装参考，参考“Unzip and move Spark”、“Configure Spark”、“Configure .bashrc” - - - End - - - this text is red

posts.title: tensorflow
posts.text: tensorflow1. 安装卸载: 如果之前安装了tensorflow，将其先卸载，再安装12source ~/tensorflow/bin/activate # 进入tensorflow环境pip uninstall tensorflow # 卸载 参考安装指导，建议在管理员权限下安装，避免权限导致安装失败123conda create -n tensorflowsource activate tensorflowpip install --ignore-installed --upgrade TF_PYTHON_URL 2. 基本命令12tf.__version__ # 版本号tf.__path__ # 安装目录

posts.title: Linux使用
posts.text: Linux使用 加载共享文件夹： 1mount -t vboxsf Share /mnt/share 切换管理员账户 12sudo su # 切换到管理员，需要输入管理员账户密码su L # 切换到 L 账户 安装及卸载 123sudo apt install vimsudo apt remove python2.7sudo apt autoremove 添加环境变量 123gedit ~/.bashrc # 打开.bashrc文件，添加下面一行，保存export PATH=/home/anaconda2/bin:$PATH # 添加环境变量source ~/.bashrc # 使之生效 ls -l: 显示当前目录下的详细信息； -a: 显示隐藏的文件 1ls -la ~/ | more

posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment - - - End - - - - - - End - - -
